subject: Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
Deaths (Obituaries)
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Mr. Burns, the coach of four National Hockey League teams, led the New Jersey Devils to a Stanley Cup title in 2003, his first season with the team.
snippet: Mr. Burns, the coach of four National Hockey League teams, led the New Jersey Devils to a Stanley Cup title in 2003, his first season with the team.
